name: Pixel Dog: A Virtual Pet (pre alpha)
name_original: Pixel Dog: A Virtual Pet (pre alpha)
description:
This is a game I made with scratch and ported to Windows, Android and HTML. It was quite hard to make, even tough its barely finished, and not compressed very well (quite big for such a simple game lol) This game is still in pre alpha, and you are very likely to encounter glitches. For the copyright stuff, please check the readme file included in the downloads. Hopefully this game could get good impressions even with its cons.

ENJOY  \(0u0)/
